description: the eight juzʻ, beginning with bāb al-rukhṣah; ff. 14. 203 x 140; 183 x 120 mm. 27 lin. 12th cen.- fol. la: samāʻ of several persons who studied the juzʻ under Ibn Nāṣir al-Dīn, dat. Ṣāliḥīyah, 12 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 836; fol. 2a: samāʻ of Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad ibn Naṣr ibn Abī al-Qāsim al-Iṣbahānī, dat. 3 Shawwāl 540; three other samāʻ - notes on last fol. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 169 (I); SI, 268.
author: Tirmidhī, Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá, -892
title: al-Jāmiʻ al-kabīr.
creator: Tirmidhī, Muḥammad ibn ʻĪsá, -892
subject: Hadith—Texts—Early works to 1800
